question_sentence: Golf legend Tiger Woods got in a car crash and suffered leg injuries Tuesday in which part of Southern California?
President Biden’s COVID-19 package does NOT include which of the following things?
choices: An increase to the minimum wage

question_sentence: NY prosecutors obtained Trump’s taxes hours after the Supreme Court denied an effort to block. There’s an important caveat. What is it?
choices: The records will be heavily redacted
They only contain records for one of his properties
They will only span the past four years of his presidency
The records won’t be made available to the public

question_sentence: According to a Gallup survey, a record ____ of U.S. adults identify as LGBTQ+?
Which of these prominent Republican figures will NOT be speaking at this year’s Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC)?
The United States, with 4% of the world’s population, has recorded what percentage of its COVID-19 deaths?
The U.S. spends more on defense than the next ten countries combined. What’s the country that spends the second most on defense worldwide?
You’ll have to keep an eye out for something special in the sky this weekend...but what is it?
Whose single-shot COVID-19 vaccine is expected to receive emergency authorization from the FDA?
Which celebrity is offering a $500k reward for the return of their dogs?
Which city is considering inoculating its homeless population with unwanted doses of the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine after some European leaders questioned the efficacy of the Covid jab?
What is the name of the influential Conservative think tank that has called for an investigation into Carrie Symonds’ influence in No. 10?
Academics have called for France’s higher education minister to resign after she ordered an inquiry into the alleged spread of what form of ‘extremism’ in universities?
Amnesty International is facing criticism after this week stripping who of their ‘prisoner of conscience’ status?
Initial research suggests that a Covid variant found in which US state is more infectious and deadly than other strains of the coronavirus?
Who is the leader of the Covid Recovery Group of Tory MPs calling for Boris Johnson to speed up the UK’s lockdown exit?
Jay-Z has sold Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton a 50% stake in his Armand de Brignac champagne brand, which is popularly known by what name?
Labour has been accused of a ‘stitch-up’ after a Jeremy Corbyn-endorsed candidate was excluded from the mayoral candidate selection race in which city?
What is the name of the Covid vaccine passports used in Israel that are being studied by Michael Gove amid proposals for similar jab certificates in the UK?
On which provisional date are all restrictions on social contact set to end in England under Boris Johnson’s roadmap for lifting lockdown?
Following a Supreme Court ruling, a New York prosecutor now has access to a lot of material related an investigation into former President Donald Trump. What kind of documents are they?
evidence: The Supreme Court has allowed the release of Trump’s personal tax returns to a Manhattan district attorney. Though not publicly available, a grand jury investigation will no longer be hampered by Trump’s fight to keep the documents secret.

question_sentence: Boeing recommended the grounding of some 777 jets following a mid-air incident last week. Which airline was at the heart of the story?
evidence: The recommendation, focusing only on planes with Pratt & Whitney 4000-112 engines, comes after a United Airlines Boeing 777 suffered engine failure, forced to make an emergency landing in Denver.

question_sentence: The Biden Administration announced talks with which nation regarding American hostages, calling it a “significant priority” for the White House?
evidence: National security adviser Jake Sullivan announced that conversations had started with Iran over the matter, calling it a “humanitarian catastrophe that is unjust.”

question_sentence: Tiger Woods was seriously injured in a car crash in California, necessitating emergency surgery on what part of his body?
evidence: Woods suffered severe fractures in his lower right leg and ankle, requiring emergency surgery. Based on the severity of the crash, Los Angeles County Sheriff Alex Villanueva said Wood’s survival was “nothing short of a miracle.”

question_sentence: President Joe Biden lauded the progress of Covid-19 vaccinations so far under his presidency. About how many doses have been administered during his time in office?
evidence: Biden applauded 50 million doses being delivered as the half-way point to his promise of 100 million shots in his first 100 days.

question_sentence: The US recently carried out airstrikes against Iranian-backed militia in what country?
evidence: According to defense officials, the airstrikes occurred in Syria and were in retaliation for rocket attacks on American forces in the region in the past weeks.

question_sentence: As it pertains to weather, what is the Pineapple Express?
choices: low pressure zones in tropical climates
magnetic interference from a solar flare
evidence: The Pineapple Express, which affected Washington and Oregon this week, is as an atmospheric river event which brings prolonged periods of wet weather to the regions its affecting.

question_sentence: To combat its highest suicide rate in 11 years, which country has appointed its first ever Minister for Loneliness?
evidence: Japan appointed Tetsushi Sakamoto to take over the position. It comes alongside the government’s creation of an “isolation/loneliness countermeasures office.”

question_sentence: People were charmed this week when the United State Postal Service unveiled an upgraded look to which postal staple?
evidence: The USPS announced the rollout of its Next Generation Delivery Vehicles, aka NGDVs, set to deliver mail and packages on American streets by 2023. People immediately compared the new vehicle to a Pixar character.

question_sentence: Which electronic dance music group is splitting up after 28 years?
evidence: The French duo Daft Punk announced their split. Formed in Paris in 1993, the Grammy Award-winning act are known the world over for hits like “Da Funk” and “One More Time.”
